items.title: '60 Minutes' chief resigns, saying show's independence was compromised
items.description: The longtime head of CBS' 60 Minutes resigned Tuesday, as the network's parent company grapples with President Trump's lawsuit over an interview the s...

items.title: The global economy will be hit hard by Trump's tariffs, IMF warns
items.description: The International Monetary Fund slashed its growth forecasts for the global economy to 2.8% as President Trump's tariffs risk sparking a trade war.

items.title: Trump fires more immigration judges even as he aims to increase deportations
items.description: Getting rid of judges adds to criticism of the Trump administration for not giving migrants or noncitizens enough due process before they're deported.

items.title: Gaza's Catholics mourn Pope Francis. 'He used to call us at 7 p.m. every night'
